name: Shizumaru
title: The Aerial Blade
subtitle: A master swordsman who excels in aerial combat
lore: A young warrior who has mastered the art of aerial combat, Shizumaru combines his deadly blade skills with an enchanted umbrella that allows him to defy gravity. His unique fighting style turns disadvantageous situations into opportunities, as he can maintain full control even when knocked into the air. His graceful yet lethal movements make him an unpredictable opponent on the battlefield.

passive.name: Fly-by
passive.description:
Whenever Shizumaru is knocked up into the air, he gains the following bonuses:
- Can move and use spells while knocked up
- Deals 40% more damage for 1.5 seconds after the knock-up ends
- Can cancel the knock-up with abilities
- Takes no damage from spells while being knocked up

Q.name: Slice Forward
Q.description: Shizumaru strikes with his blade and dashes in the targeted direction. If he passes through enemies, he deals [85/180/370/500/690] damage. During Dash, Shizumaru opens his umbrella forward, and negates any spell damage that comes from the direction he is facing. This ability can be used while in the air and cancels the knock-up.

W.name: Self Fly-by
W.description: Shizumaru jumps into the air using his umbrella, remaining airborne for [1s].

E.name: Blade Blending
E.description: Shizumaru releases a shockwave in a targeted short direction. If it hits an enemy, it deals [50/90/165/220/370] magic damage, slows them by [40%] for [1.5s], and interrupts any jump abilities.

R.name: Spinning Slasher
R.description: Shizumaru targets a nearby enemy, opens his umbrella, and continuously chases and spins around the target for [4.5s]. The ability deals [55/75/105] damage every [0.5s]. During the ability's duration, W (Self Fly-by) can be used, allowing Spinning Slasher to continue, but no other abilities can be used. While Fly-by or Self Fly-by is active, Spinning Slasher deals no damage. The ability can be interrupted at any time by Shizumaru or by a stun.

1.name: Aerial Dominance
1.description: Shizumaru also gains [0.35] attack speed when landing

1.name: Umbrella Tactics
1.description: Using Self-fly-by or being knocked up cleanses Shizumaru from any negative movement impairing effects

1.name: Deadly Precision
1.description: Shizumaru's Q deals bonus [15%] damage to enemies below [27%] HP

5.name: Sharpened Blades
5.description: Slice Forward applies a bleeding effect, dealing [25%] of Shizumaru's AD over [2.5s]

5.name: Paralyzing Strikes
5.description: Blade Blending applies 25% healing reduction for [2.5s]

5.name: Mana Flow
5.description: Shizumaru gains [20% bonus damage] if he is below [40%] MaxMana

10.name: Cyclone of Destruction
10.description: Your R ability ignores damage reduction

10.name: Relentless Pursuit
10.description: Enemies that have [130%] of Shizumaru's HP or more take additional [15%] more damage every [0.5s] from your R

15.name: Quick Draw
15.description: Every time Slice Forward hits an enemy champion, its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

15.name: Protective Winds
15.description: Being knocked up or using Self Fly-by creates a wind around Shizumaru, pushing enemies away from him.

20.name: Hide in The Shadows
20.description: Item: You can go stealth for [2s] [60s cooldown]

20.name: Unyielding Tempo
20.description: Each basic attack reduces self fly-by (W) by 1s

20.name: Endless Chase
20.description: Shizumaru gains [30%] bonus movement speed for the rest of the game

20.name: The Demon Inside Me
20.description: If Shizumaru kills an enemy, he gains [37%] of their MaxHP as Shield for [3.5s]

strengths: Can turn crowd control into advantages
Good at chasing and executing targets
Unique ability to fight while airborne
weaknesses: Relies on proper timing of abilities
